item.title: 雷诺与中国力帆汽车和小米洽谈技术合作
item.description: 法国汽车制造商雷诺周五表示，本周与中国力帆汽车和小米公司就电动和智能汽车技术举行了会谈，为与这两家公司潜在的技术合作打开了大门。【原文：Renault held talks this week with China's Li Auto and Xiaomi on electric and intelligent vehicle technologies, the French carmaker said on Friday, opening the door to potential collaboration on technology with the two companies.】

item.title: 美国股票基金在降息评估重启后连续第四周资金外流
item.description: 受今年降息预期减弱的影响，美国股票基金在截至4月24日的一周内连续第四周出现资金外流。【原文：U.S. equity funds registered their fourth successive weekly outflows in the week ended April 24, hit by fading expectations for rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 重新跻身 2 万亿美元估值俱乐部
item.description: 周五，Alphabet 市值自 2021 年 11 月以来首次突破 2 万亿美元大关，谷歌母公司宣布首次派息和 700 亿美元股票回购，令投资者欢欣鼓舞。【原文：Alphabet breached the $2 trillion market value mark for the first time since November 2021 on Friday, as investors cheered the Google parent announcing its first-ever dividend and a $70 billion stock buyback.】

item.title: 交易员加大对美联储 9 月开始降息的押注
item.description: 周五的一份政府报告显示，美国上个月的通胀率上升符合预期，交易商因此加大了对美国联邦储备委员会将于今年 9 月首次降息的押注。【原文：Traders added to bets that the U.S. Federal Reserve will deliver its first interest rate cut this year in September, after a government report on Friday showed U.S. inflation rose last month in line with expectations.】

item.title: 美国 3 月通胀率升幅符合预期
item.description: 美国通胀率在 3 月份温和上升，但这不太可能改变金融市场对美联储将在 9 月份之前暂缓降息的预期。【原文：U.S. inflation rose moderately in March, but that is unlikely to change financial markets' expectations that the Federal Reserve will hold off cutting interest rates until September.】

item.title: 受市场反弹的影响，T Rowe季度利润超出预期
item.description: T Rowe Price 公司周五表示，由于市场上扬推动了公司管理资产的增长，并减轻了资金外流带来的冲击，公司第一季度利润超出预期。【原文：T Rowe Price's first-quarter profit beat expectations as an upswing in markets boosted its assets under management and softened the hit from outflows, it said on Friday.】

item.title: 利安德巴塞尔第一季度利润超预期，预计将受季节性需求推动
item.description: 石油化工制造商利安德巴塞尔（LyondellBasell）周五表示，在第一季度利润超过预期后，预计本季度大部分部门的季节性需求将有所改善。【原文：Petrochemical manufacturer LyondellBasell said on Friday it expects seasonal demand improvements across most of its units in the current quarter after it beat first-quarter profit estimates.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司首席执行官表示考虑在纽约上市
item.description: 法国石油巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）首席执行官帕特里克-普瓦纳（Patrick Pouyanne）周五告诉分析师，该公司将考虑在纽约上市的可能性。【原文：French oil major TotalEnergies will consider a possible listing in New York, Chief Executive Patrick Pouyanne told analysts on Friday.】

item.title: HCA 第一季度利润超出预期，原因是收治病人数量增加
item.description: HCA Healthcare周五公布的季度利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于医疗保健服务需求带来的患者入院人数增加。【原文：HCA Healthcare on Friday beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly profit, helped by higher patient admissions due to demand for healthcare services.】

item.title: 美联储降息希望受挫，全球股票基金面临第四周资金外流
item.description: 截至 4 月 24 日，全球股票基金连续第四周录得资金流出，原因是美国通胀数据连续高于预期，美联储今年快速降息的希望越来越渺茫。【原文：Global equity funds recorded outflows for the fourth consecutive week as of April 24, affected by diminishing hopes of rapid Federal Reserve rate cuts this year amid a series of higher-than-expected U.S. inflation readings.】

item.title: 艾伯维因 Skyrizi 销售强劲而上调年度利润预期
item.description: 艾伯维周五上调了年度利润预期，因为其免疫学药物 Skyrizi 和抗癌药物 Imbruvica 的强劲销售帮助该公司第一季度的业绩超过了华尔街的预期。【原文：AbbVie raised its annual profit forecast on Friday after strong sales of its immunology drug Skyrizi and cancer drug Imbruvica helped the company beat Wall Street estimates for the first quarter.】

item.title: 高露洁-棕榄第一季度业绩强劲，上调销售增长目标
item.description: 牙膏生产商高露洁-棕榄公司周五上调了全年有机销售额增长预期，原因是其高价位的自我保健和宠物营养产品需求强劲。【原文：Toothpaste maker Colgate-Palmolive raised forecast for annual organic sales growth on Friday, banking on resilient demand for its highly priced self-care and pet nutrition products.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称阿联酋计划建设第二座核电站
item.description: 三位熟知内情的消息人士称，阿拉伯联合酋长国不久将招标建造一座新的核电站，这将使这个海湾小国的核反应堆数量翻一番。【原文：The United Arab Emirates will tender shortly for the construction of a new nuclear power plant that would double the number of the small Gulf state's nuclear reactors, three sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 菲利普斯 66 第一季度利润低于预期，原因是利润率疲软
item.description: 受燃料价格下降导致炼油利润率下滑的影响，炼油商菲利普斯 66 周五未能实现预期的季度利润。【原文：Refiner Phillips 66 missed quarterly profit estimates on Friday, hurt by a slump in refining margins following a decline in fuel prices.】

item.title: 个人电脑芯片需求疲软影响第二季度业绩预期，英特尔业绩下滑
item.description: 英特尔公司周五盘前股价暴跌超过 7%，原因是其第二季度销售预测不乐观，表明人工智能技术的蓬勃发展正在使企业支出从其传统的数据中心和 PC 芯片上转移。【原文：Intel shares slumped more than 7% premarket on Friday after a downbeat second-quarter sales forecast signaled that the boom in AI technology was diverting enterprise spending away from its traditional data center and PC chips.】

item.title: 怡安第一季度利润因投资和基金收益而增长
item.description: 周五，怡安公司公布第一季度利润增长，主要得益于投资收益和托管资金的增加。【原文：Aon reported a rise in first-quarter profit on Friday, powered by increases in interest earned from investments as well as funds held in a fiduciary capacity.】

item.title: 戴姆勒卡车公司面临 7,300 多名美国工人即将举行的罢工
item.description: 戴姆勒卡车公司必须在周五结束前与美国南部六家工厂的 7,300 多名小时工达成新的劳动合同，否则将面临美国汽车工人联合会（UAW）工会成员可能举行的罢工。【原文：Daimler Truck must reach a new labor contract with over 7,300 hourly workers at six facilities in the U.S. South by the end of Friday or face a possible strike by the United Auto Workers (UAW) union members.】

item.title: 埃克森公司第一季度利润不佳，尽管在圭亚那取得了巨大收益
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp）周五公布的第一季度利润同比下降 28%，不及分析师预期，原因是炼油利润率下降和天然气价格下跌抵消了销量的增长。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp on Friday missed analysts' estimates with a 28% year-on-year drop in first quarter profits as weaker refining margins and lower natural gas prices offset volume gains.】

item.title: 雪佛龙公司季度利润超出预期
item.description: 石油巨头雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp）周五公布的第一季度利润超出预期，原因是产量增加帮助抵消了天然气价格疲软带来的冲击。【原文：Oil giant Chevron Corp beat estimates for first-quarter profit on Friday as higher production volumes helped offset a hit from weak natural gas prices.】

item.title: Alphabet 和微软业绩提振大型股，期指攀升
item.description: 美国股指期货周五上涨，原因是大型成长股在 Alphabet 和微软强劲的季度业绩支撑下反弹，同时投资者在等待可能有助于制定美国货币政策的关键通胀数据。【原文：U.S. stock index futures advanced on Friday as megacap growth shares rebounded on the back of robust quarterly results from Alphabet and Microsoft, while investors awaited a key inflation print that could help shape U.S. monetary policy.】

item.title: 洞察力：比亚迪电动车出口售价为何是中国售价的两倍
item.description: 美国和欧洲的政界人士已经发出警报，他们的国内汽车产业可能会被中国廉价电动汽车的浪潮摧毁。但到目前为止，中国最大的电动汽车制造商比亚迪已经大幅提高了出口价格，而不是压低外国竞争对手的价格。【原文：U.S. and European politicians have raised alarms that their domestic auto industries could be destroyed by a wave of cheap Chinese electric vehicles. But so far, China's top EV maker, BYD, has dramatically hiked export prices compared to what it charges at home rather than undercut foreign rivals.】

item.title: 美国调查特斯拉因自动驾驶汽车召回 200 万辆汽车事件，引人关注
item.description: 美国汽车安全监管机构周五表示，他们已开始调查特斯拉 12 月宣布召回 200 多万辆汽车以安装新的 Autopilot 保障措施是否充分。【原文：U.S. auto safety regulators said Friday they have opened an investigation into whether Tesla's recall of more than 2 million vehicles announced in December to install new Autopilot safeguards is adequate.】

item.title: 早间竞价：大科技股跷跷板翻转，日元大幅波动
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 中国交通银行一季度利润增长 1.44
item.description: 在经济放缓的背景下，中国交通银行股份有限公司（交行）第一季度净利润增长 1.44%。【原文：China's Bank of Communications Co Ltd (BoCom) , reported a 1.44% rise in first-quarter net profit amid a slowing economy.】

item.title: 贷款和消费者数据巩固了欧洲央行降息的理由
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（ECB）周五的报告显示，由于创纪录的高借贷成本不断给欧元区经济踩刹车，欧元区3月份的贷款继续停滞不前，消费者降低了通胀预期。【原文：Euro zone lending continued to stagnate in March and consumers trimmed their inflation expectations as record-high borrowing costs kept putting the brakes on the euro zone's economy, European Central Bank (ECB) reports showed on Friday.】

item.title: 中国中信证券第一季度利润下降 8.5
item.description: 中国最大的券商中信证券股份有限公司周五公布第一季度净利润下降 8.5%。【原文：CITIC Securities Co , , China's biggest brokerage, on Friday reported an 8.5% fall in first-quarter net profit.】

item.title: 伊莱克斯第一季度因需求疲软亏损近三倍，但业绩超出预期
item.description: 由于需求疲软和北美市场表现不佳，伊莱克斯第一季度的营业亏损几乎增加了两倍，但由于原材料成本下降，亏损比预期的要小，股价因此上涨了 6%。【原文：Electrolux's operating loss nearly tripled in the first quarter on weak demand and poor performance in North America, but the loss was smaller than expected as raw material costs eased, sending shares up 6%.】

item.title: 华为智能汽车技术为汽车制造商提供中国销售之路
item.description: 华为仅用了四年时间就成为了智能汽车技术领域的一支生力军，在应对贸易制裁对其智能手机业务造成的破坏的同时，还开发出了成为北京车展宠儿的驾驶员辅助系统。【原文：It's taken Huawei just four years to become a force in smart car technology, navigating the devastation of trade sanctions on its smartphones business while simultaneously developing a driver assistance system that is the darling of the Beijing auto show.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 将以约 53.2 亿美元收购英国 Darktrace 公司
item.description: 私募股权公司 Thoma Bravo 周五表示，已同意以约 53.2 亿美元现金收购英国网络安全公司 Darktrace。【原文：Private equity firm Thoma Bravo has agreed to buy British cybersecurity firm Darktrace for about $5.32 billion in cash, the companies said on Friday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯储蓄银行第一季度利润增至 43 亿美元
item.description: 俄罗斯最大的银行储蓄银行周五公布第一季度净利润为 3974 亿卢布（43.2 亿美元），同比增长 11.3%。【原文：Russia's dominant lender Sberbank on Friday reported a first-quarter net profit of 397.4 billion roubles ($4.32 billion), up 11.3% from a year earlier.】
